pr_title: CorfuQueue: Don't use epoch for ordering

timeline.message:
CorfuQueue: Don't use epoch for ordering

Ordering is whatever corfu transaction layer considers as ordering.
Since epoch doesn't feature there, remove epoch from Queue.
This way if we epoch+sequence order ever diverges from sequence only
order, the causality will be consistent with stream's causality.

CorfuRecordId -> byte[] and back for opaque serialization.

Note that comparator must still live within CorfuRecordId.
